title: Accepted view bouquet-specific 1s fade-in + subtle pulsing glow (reduced-motion aware)

requirements.summary: Animate only the accepted-view 2D bouquet image with a 1.0s fade-in when the accepted view is shown, without changing the existing global .fade-in timing elsewhere.
acceptanceCriteria: When transitioning into the accepted view, only the bouquet image transitions from invisible to visible with a 1.0s fade-in.
The existing .fade-in animation used elsewhere (currently 0.6s) remains unchanged for non-bouquet content.
The bouquet image remains the same size/footprint as before (w-56 h-56 object-contain).
With prefers-reduced-motion enabled, the bouquet does not animate (or uses a near-instant transition).

file_operations.description: In the accepted view only, apply a bouquet-specific animation class to the 2D bouquet (keeping the existing w-56 h-56 object-contain sizing intact) so its fade-in timing can be 1.0s without changing the .fade-in wrapper used by other views.

Add a new bouquet-only fade-in animation (1.0s) and a prefers-reduced-motion override that disables or near-instantly completes the bouquet animation, while leaving the existing .fade-in (0.6s) definition unchanged.

requirements.summary: Add a subtle glow behind the accepted-view 2D bouquet image and make it gently pulse continuously without affecting layout or overlapping/tinting the bouquet or nearby text (reduced-motion aware).
acceptanceCriteria: A soft, subtle glow is visible behind the bouquet image in the accepted view.
The glow gently pulses (smooth in/out) and does not distract from readability of surrounding text.
The glow is layered behind the bouquet image (no tint over the bouquet artwork itself).
With prefers-reduced-motion enabled, the glow does not pulse (static glow or removed).

file_operations.description: In the accepted view only, wrap the bouquet image in a relative/isolation container and render a separate, absolutely-positioned glow element behind the image (with appropriate z-index layering) so it does not affect layout and cannot overlap surrounding text outside the image area.

Add CSS for the bouquet glow element: a subtle blurred radial glow (behind the bouquet via stacking context) with a gentle pulsing keyframes animation; include prefers-reduced-motion handling to stop the pulsing (static glow or no animation).
